Hoće li 50.000.000 evra biti dovoljno? Atletiko u poodmaklim pregovorima sa brazilskim čudom od deteta
Jorgandžije uspešno pregovarale sa Rejnierom, a sada sledi teži deo posla i razgovori sa upravom Flamenga

01 Nov 2019

Atletiko Madrid je ozbiljno odmakao u pregovorima oko dovođenja Flamengovog vunderkinda Rejniera Žesusa Karvalja. Kako piše madridski AS, razgovori sa igračem su bili više nego pozitivni, a sada je došao trenutak da se pređe na pegovore i sa brazilskim velikanom, što će predstavljati znatno teži posao.


Oni su generacija 2002: Fića Stevanović među 60 najtalentovanijih na svetu! Poznati sinovi, Samardžić i imena koja treba zapamtiti...


Za sjajnog 17-godišnjeg vezistu, koji se smatra jednim od najtalentovanijih igrača na planeti u svojoj generaciji, interesuju se svi veliki evropski klubovi, pa u Flamengu mogu da tvrde pazar. Igrač u aktuelnom ugvoru sa klubom ima izlaznu klauzulu od 62.000.000 evra, ali su Jorgandžije uverene da mogu da snize tu cifru, iako nisu sigurni koliko ima prostora za pregovore."Ako nas bilo koji klub pita, imate li Vinisijusa 2 u svojim redovima? Reći ćemo, to je on. Ali, on neće otići za manju sumu od one za koju su otišli Vinisijus i Rodrigo", poručio je nedavno pomoćnik predsednika Luis Gustavo Nogeria.
Pošto je Vinisijus koštao 45.000.000, a Rodrigo 40.000.000, malo je verovatno da bi Flamengo pristao za sumu manju od 50.000.000 evra. Tokom leta Flamengo je navodno odbio 30.000.000 evra od jednog premijerligaša, Inter je želeo da ga ubaci u kombinaciju oko prodaje Gabigola, a njegov razvoj intenzivno prati i Real Madrid. Kako navodi AS, u Španiji i Brazilu nemaju sumnju da će Rejnier postati svetska zvezda. Ove godine Rejnier je odigrao devet utakmica i postigao tri gola, uz dve asistencije.

Will € 50,000,000 be enough? Atletico in advanced negotiations with the Brazilian child prodigy
Georgians successfully negotiated with Reynier, and now comes the hard part and talks with the Flamengo administration

01 Nov 2019

Atletico Madrid have made serious strides in negotiations over bringing Flamenco's Wunderkind Rainer Jesse Carvalho. According to Madrid's AS, the talks with the player have been more than positive, and now the time has come to move on to the pegs and the Brazilian giant, which will represent a much harder job.


They are Generation 2002: Fića Stevanovic among the 60 most talented in the world! Famous sons, Samardzic and names to remember ...


The great 17-year-old midfielder, considered one of the most talented players on the planet in his generation, is interested in all major European clubs, so they can claim the market in Flamengo. The current player with the club has an exit clause of € 62,000,000, but the Georgians are confident that they can lower that figure, although they are not sure how much room there is to negotiate. " "We will say, this is him. But he will not go for less than the amount that Vinci and Rodrigo went to," said Presidential aide Luis Gustavo Nogeria recently.
Since Vincius cost 45,000,000 and Rodrigo 40,000,000, it is unlikely that Flamengo would agree to a sum of less than 50,000,000 euros. During the summer, Flamengo reportedly deducted € 30,000,000 from one Premier League player, Inter wanted to put him in the mix over the sale of Gabigolo, and his development is closely followed by Real Madrid. According to AS, Spain and Brazil have no doubt that Reynier will become a world star. This year, Reynier played nine games and scored three goals, with two assists.
